job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field

jd: From: Anurag, Anurag Digital dhara anurag@digitaldhara.com Reply to: anurag@digitaldhara.com Job Title: Java Full Stack DeveloperLocation: Bellevue, WA , 5 days onsiteOnly Ex - Microsoft / Ex- AmazonJob Summary:We are seeking a skilled and experienced Java Full Stack Developer to join our team in Bellevue, WA. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Java, AWS, Cloud technologies, and extensive experience in both front-end and back-end development. You will work on designing, developing, and deploying scalable web applications using cutting-edge technologies like AngularJS, Spring, and AWS Cloud services.Key Responsibilities:• Design and develop end-to-end full stack applications with a focus on cloud architecture.• Build and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code using Java, J2EE, Spring, and related technologies.• Integrate front-end UI components using AngularJS and Angular frameworks.• Develop APIs, web services, and cloud-based services using AWS Cloud technologies (S3, Lambda, API Gateway).• Implement software solutions using cloud platforms, ensuring scalability, security, and high performance.• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and analyze requirements, design solutions, and implement features.• Optimize the performance of applications and troubleshoot production issues.• Write well-structured, testable, and efficient code while adhering to coding best practices.• Utilize Data Structures and algorithms to solve complex problems.• Actively participate in code reviews and mentoring junior developers.Required Skills:• Java, J2EE expertise.• Strong experience with AWS Cloud services (S3, Lambda, API Gateway, etc.).• Proficiency in Spring Framework.• Hands-on experience with AngularJS and Angular for front-end development.• Strong knowledge of Data Structures and algorithms.• Excellent understanding of API development and RESTful services.• Proficient in coding and problem-solving.• Familiarity with Gate or related automation technologies.Preferred Qualifications:• Prior experience with AWS Cloud migration or cloud-native applications.• Experience with CI/CD tools for automated testing and deployment.• Knowledge of containerization technologies like Docker and Kubernetes.Education & Experience:• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.• 4+ years of professional experience as a Java Full Stack Developer.• Proven experience with AWS and cloud development.
